title: Air France unions call for new round of strikes in April
text:
April 4, 2018 / 4:39 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago Air France unions call for new round of strikes in April Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
PARIS (Reuters) - Air France unions called on Wednesday for a new round of strikes on April 17, 18, 23 and 24 after management again refused to consider their requests for higher wages. Air France employees stand at the check in desk at Nice airport as Air France pilots, cabin and ground crews unions call for strike over salaries in France, April 3, 2018. REUTERS/Eric Gaillard 
The airline was hit by a series of strikes in March and early April and the unions have already planned to go on strike on April 7, 10 and 11. 
Air France management has said that the unionsâ€™ demands for a six percent wage increase could jeopardise its growth plans. Reporting by Cyril Altmeyer; Writing by Maya Nikolaeva; Editing by Leigh Thomas
